name: outing
content:
outing noun
(JOURNEY)
Add to word list
Add to word list
[ C ] a short journey made by a group of people, usually for pleasure or education: Every year the professor takes her students on an outing to the archives of the Library of Congress.UK Rosie's going on a class/school outing to the Wildlife Park.

See more results »
outing noun
(MADE PUBLIC)
[ C or U ] an occasion when it is made public that a famous person is gay when he or she wanted to keep this information private: There have been several outings of well-known movie stars recently.
Add to word list
Add to word list
a short trip, taken for pleasure or entertainment: a family outing an outing to the beach
